attributes.action: Cap new drivers insurance in Bradford West Yorkshire
attributes.additional_details:
Currently young drivers aged between 17-24 if employed receive between £3.50 to £7.05 if employed by a generous employer. 

In Bradford City area you can expect to pay £4000 a year for basic insurance to insure a car with a value of less than £500.
attributes.background: I started this petition to raise awareness of the struggle young drivers have to legally drive on the roads of Bradford once they pass their driving test. I work as a Driving Instructor within Bradford. It's sad to see driver pass and have to wait a long time to insure their car once they pass.

rejection.details:
The UK Government or Parliament are not responsible for setting car insurance rates in different parts of the UK. 

You might be interested in signing this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/190066
